name: Full Adder
description: Create a full adder: adds two 1-bit numbers with carry-in, outputs sum and carry-out
fullDescription: The full adder extends the half adder by accepting a carry-in from a previous stage. This allows chaining multiple full adders to add numbers of any size! A 32-bit processor uses 32 full adders connected together. You can build it using two half adders and an OR gate for the carry-out.
